@[ObjTitleStart]Exploit the Ley Lines...@[ObjTitleEnd]Whenever you build a mana bank, advance @[objective] 4.

@[ObjTitleStart]...ToLearn Their Secrets.@[ObjTitleEnd]Advance @[Objective] 2 whenever you use the bonus action from a mana bank while winning an ambition.
@[ObjTitleStart]Delve Deep Into Dark Secrets@[ObjTitleEnd]Advance @[objective] 4 each time you scrap a card using Seekers of the Dark.

@[ObjTitleStart]Plunge the World Into Darkness@[ObjTitleEnd]

@[grand_ambition]You have more pieces on The Box than the current chapter times 4.

@[grand_ambition]You have more cards on The Box than the current chapter.
